title: Easy Way for Women to Stop Smoking by Allen Carr
description:
In the Easy Way for Women to Stop Smoking Allen Carr addresses the difficulties that women smokers face when trying to quit, and shows how his technique successfully resolves them. Allen's unique method removes the feeling of deprivation and works without using willpower. This book can enable any woman to escape the nicotine trap easily, painlessly and permanently without putting on weight.
"For the first time in my adult life I am Free" - Woman's journal
"If you are one of those folks single-handedly keeping your local tabacconist in business, but want to ditch the demon weed, this is for you" - OK! Magazine
"Allen Carr explodes the myth that giving up smoking is difficult" - The Time
